title: This game is so trash
body:
Bro!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Every game, there is a feeder
every game there is a troll
every game people give up
every game its some dumb ass little kid playing
every game is always gg at 10 mins in

even if you die twice all fucking game, your teammates find a way to feed the living hell out of everyone on the team.

this game is so ass

replies.body: If you are seeing it every game, chances are you have something to do with it.
then leave and realize that no one will recognize that you left, and enjoy your time away.. or come back no one cares
